body:
Can you add descriptions for arguments, for e.g. I can't tell what "require" does just from reading the signature?
Even better if you can write add the comment in the following format:
"""One line description.

Args:
  arg name: description for arg
"""

Also, can you change protoc to an argument without default value? Seems like protoc is required. Having a default value makes it seems like it is ok to call 'generate_proto' without 'protoc'.

body_text:
Can you add descriptions for arguments, for e.g. I can't tell what "require" does just from reading the signature?
Even better if you can write add the comment in the following format:
"""One line description.
Args:
arg name: description for arg
"""
Also, can you change protoc to an argument without default value? Seems like protoc is required. Having a default value makes it seems like it is ok to call 'generate_proto' without 'protoc'.
